description: The group Palestine Action was banned in the UK after activists broke into a British air force base in June to protest British military support for Israel’s war with Hamas.

description: In an opinion piece for Le Monde, the vice president of the Institute for Research and Studies on the Mediterranean and the Middle East, analyzes statements by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, who has announced his intention to take full control of the Gaza Strip.

headline: Life with a disfigured face: 'You never get used to others' stares, you just live with it'
description: Whether due to an accident or illness, a major facial alteration can profoundly disrupt one's sense of identity. People who have been disfigured describe the painful processes of reclaiming their lives.
